Beyond meat stock is getting leaner as the company hopes to get meatier. 

But now it has run into some big roadblocks - Dunkin threw them out.  Retail has shown attritions and they have warned of a revenue slow down.  Too pricey for a slow growth company.

Beyond Meat is in trouble, competition has increased dramatically and the company’s growth has stagnated. “If your business is dropping by that much in sales and you’re spending more money, something is really wrong,” Lemonides.
